faqs.question: How do I start playing?
faqs.answer: Tap a cow to begin a short rhythm challenge. Hitting notes on time earns coins and milk.

faqs.question: What is the goal of Moo-d Swings?
faqs.answer: Grow your farm by completing rhythm games, planting crops and unlocking new cows and upgrades.

faqs.question: How do I earn more coins and milk?
faqs.answer: Complete rhythm games, harvest your crops and collect milk from happy cows.

faqs.question: What can I buy in the shop?
faqs.answer: Spend coins or milk on seeds, one-time consumables and upgrades that make the rhythm challenges easier.

faqs.question: How do crops work?
faqs.answer: Plant seeds in the field and wait for them to grow. Harvest them when they're ready to gain extra coins.

faqs.question: Why should I keep my cows happy?
faqs.answer: Happy cows provide better rewards and will level up if they stay joyful for a while.

faqs.question: Do seasons and weather matter?
faqs.answer: Yes. Seasons change crop growth speed and the daily weather can affect cow moods.

faqs.question: What do upgrades do?
faqs.answer: Upgrades like the Pitchfork and Metronome improve your accuracy and timing, while others automate tasks such as watering crops.

faqs.question: Are there secret cows?
faqs.answer: Some cows unlock after earning achievements or collecting enough milk and coins. Check the stats page for your progress.

faqs.question: How do I save my progress?
faqs.answer: The game auto-saves every few minutes, and you can manually save from the menu at any time.

faqs.question: Where can I see the leaderboard?
faqs.answer: Use the leaderboard link on the main menu to compare your XP with other players.

faqs.question: Any tips for high scores?
faqs.answer: Build combos for bonus points and try different cows to master their unique rhythm patterns.
